Text: Plot: Foolâ€™s Gold. A film about friends, traveling, good times and most of allâ€Ś snowboarding. In our eleventh full length feature, we travelled the world in search for snow, spots, parties and new friends. We came back with a bag full of tricks, 300 hours of raw footage and incredible stories which we experienced on our journeys. Feel like a part of the crew that makes Isenseven what it is, in our most personal film to date.
